text: Nobuo Uematsu (植松 伸夫; Uematsu Nobuo, born 21 March 1959) is a Japanese video game music composer. He composed music for each role-playing games for Square Enix, including Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger. == Other websites == * Nobuo Uematsu's official Japanese website * Nobuo Uematsu's official English website * Smile Please Co., Ltd. official Japanese website * Unofficial Nobuo Uematsu website Category:1959 births Category:Living people Uematsu, Nobuo Category:People from Kōchi Prefecture
title: Nobuo Uematsu
